```lean4
import Mathlib

/--
Suppose that $A$, $B$, $C$, and $D$ are distinct points, no three of which lie on a line, in the Euclidean plane. Show that if the squares of the lengths of the line segments $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BC$, $BD$, and $CD$ are rational numbers, then the quotient $\frac{\text{area}(\triangle ABC)}{\text{area}(\triangle ABD)}$ is a rational number.
-/
theorem putnam_2018_a6
  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
  (PPprops : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
  (ABCDnoline : ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, C} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, C, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {B, C, D})
  (ABCDsqrrat : PPprops A B ∧ PPprops A C ∧ PPprops A D ∧ PPprops B C ∧ PPprops B D ∧ PPprops C D) :
  ∃ q : ℚ, (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal = q :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a6
  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
  (PPprops : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
  (ABCDnoline : ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, C} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, C, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {B, C, D})
  (ABCDsqrrat : PPprops A B ∧ PPprops A C ∧ PPprops A D ∧ PPprops B C ∧ PPprops B D ∧ PPprops C D) :
  ∃ q : ℚ, (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal = q := by
  rcases ABCDsqrrat with ⟨h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆⟩
  rcases hPPprops A B with ⟨h₇, ⟨q₁, h₈⟩⟩
  rcases hPPprops A C with ⟨h₉, ⟨q₂, h₁₀⟩⟩
  rcases hPPprops A D with ⟨h₁₁, ⟨q₃, h₁₂⟩⟩
  rcases hPPprops B C with ⟨h₁₃, ⟨q₄, h₁₄⟩⟩
  rcases hPPprops B D with ⟨h₁₅, ⟨q₅, h₁₆⟩⟩
  rcases hPPprops C D with ⟨h₁₇, ⟨q₆, h₁₈⟩⟩
  use (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal
  <;> simp_all [div_eq_mul_inv]
  <;> field_simp [h₇, h₉, h₁₁, h₁₃, h₁₅, h₁₇]
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_cast
  <;> simp_all [mul_comm]
  <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (q₁), sq_nonneg (q₂), sq_nonneg (q₃), sq_nonneg (q₄), sq_nonneg (q₅), sq_nonneg (q₆)]
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a6
  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
  (PPprops : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
  (ABCDnoline : ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, C} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, C, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {B, C, D})
  (ABCDsqrrat : PPprops A B ∧ PPprops A C ∧ PPprops A D ∧ PPprops B C ∧ PPprops B D ∧ PPprops C D) :
  ∃ q : ℚ, (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal = q := by
  rcases ABCDsqrrat with ⟨h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆⟩
  rcases h₁ with ⟨h₁₁, h₁₂⟩
  rcases h₂ with ⟨h₂₁, h₂₂⟩
  rcases h₃ with ⟨h₃₁, h₃₂⟩
  rcases h₄ with ⟨h₄₁, h₄₂⟩
  rcases h₅ with ⟨h₅₁, h₅₂⟩
  rcases h₆ with ⟨h₆₁, h₆₂⟩
  use (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal
  <;> simp_all
  <;> field_simp [h₁₁, h₂₁, h₃₁, h₄₁, h₅₁, h₆₁]
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_cast
  <;> simp_all [h₁₂, h₂₂, h₃₂, h₄₂, h₅₂, h₆₂]
  <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (A), sq_nonneg (B), sq_nonneg (C), sq_nonneg (D)]
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a6
  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
  (PPprops : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
  (ABCDnoline : ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, C} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, C, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {B, C, D})
  (ABCDsqrrat : PPprops A B ∧ PPprops A C ∧ PPprops A D ∧ PPprops B C ∧ PPprops B D ∧ PPprops C D) :
  ∃ q : ℚ, (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal = q := by
  rcases ABCDsqrrat with ⟨h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆⟩
  rcases hPPprops A B with ⟨h₇, q, h₈⟩
  rcases hPPprops A C with ⟨h₉, q', h₁₀⟩
  rcases hPPprops A D with ⟨h₁₁, q'', h₁₂⟩
  rcases hPPprops B C with ⟨h₁₃, q''', h₁₄⟩
  rcases hPPprops B D with ⟨h₁₅, q'''', h₁₆⟩
  rcases hPPprops C D with ⟨h₁₇, q''''', h₁₈⟩
  use (q'''')
  norm_num [h₈, h₁₀, h₁₂, h₁₄, h₁₆, h₁₈, ABCDnoline, h₇, h₉, h₁₁, h₁₃, h₁₅, h₁₇] at *
  <;> field_simp [h₈, h₁₀, h₁₂, h₁₄, h₁₆, h₁₈] at *
  <;> norm_cast at *
  <;> linarith
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a6
  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
  (PPprops : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
  (ABCDnoline : ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, C} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, B, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {A, C, D} ∧ ¬Collinear ℝ {B, C, D})
  (ABCDsqrrat : PPprops A B ∧ PPprops A C ∧ PPprops A D ∧ PPprops B C ∧ PPprops B D ∧ PPprops C D) :
  ∃ q : ℚ, (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal = q := by
  rcases ABCDsqrrat with ⟨h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆⟩
  rcases hPPprops A B with ⟨h₇, q, h₈⟩
  rcases hPPprops A C with ⟨h₉, q', h₁₀⟩
  rcases hPPprops A D with ⟨h₁₁, q'', h₁₂⟩
  rcases hPPprops B C with ⟨h₁₃, q''', h₁₄⟩
  rcases hPPprops B D with ⟨h₁₅, q'''', h₁₆⟩
  rcases hPPprops C D with ⟨h₁₇, q''''', h₁₈⟩
  use (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C}) / MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, D})).toReal
  <;> simp_all
  <;> try norm_num
  <;> try linarith
  <;> try nlinarith
  <;> try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (dist A B), sq_nonneg (dist A C), sq_nonneg (dist A D), sq_nonneg (dist B C), sq_nonneg (dist B D), sq_nonneg (dist C D)]
```

  (A B C D : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))

  (hPPprops : ∀ P1 P2, PPprops P1 P2 ↔ P1 ≠ P2 ∧ (∃ q : ℚ, (dist P1 P2) ^ 2 = q))
